game.name: Pinfall
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: From the center of the Earth to the outskirts of reality, overcome the impossible in Pinfall: An extremely difficult physics-based platformer where momentum is key. While talking to NPCs, collecting items, and customizing your look, keep climbing as the impending fall awaits...
game.shortDescriptionEn: From the center of the Earth to the outskirts of reality, overcome the impossible in Pinfall: An extremely difficult physics-based platformer where momentum is key. While talking to NPCs, collecting items, and customizing your look, keep climbing as the impending fall awaits...
